        timeout - - timeout in milliseconds

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Returns:

        Returns:
        the handshake dictionary

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Dispose the connection.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Invalidate the connection. Marks the connection for future disposal, but does not cancel currently running requests.
